message: Let's start with a generous offer, Bob. Take 1000 and let's seal the deal!
You're too stingy, Alice. Meet me in the middle!
You think I'm stingy? You're the one who's lowballing me, Bob! I'll give you a counteroffer.
You want to meet in the middle? I'll give you a slightly lower middle ground. Take 3000 and let's move on!
I'm not budging, Alice. It's time to meet in the middle for real this time!
You're not budging, huh? I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of you. I'll give you a counteroffer.
I'm not meeting you in the middle just yet, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better offer. Take 4500 and let's see if you'll accept.
You're getting closer, Alice, but I'm still not satisfied. I want more!
You want more? I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away the farm. I'll counter with a new offer.
I'm not going to give you the majority, Bob. Take 4800 and let's call it a day.
I'm not backing down, Alice. I think I deserve more than that!
You're being stubborn, Bob. I'll give you a slight concession, but I'm not going to give away 60% of the pot. I'll counter with a new offer.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob. Take 5100 and let's settle this. It's getting close to the final round, and I don't want to risk losing more value to inflation.
I'm not going to let you take advantage of me, Alice. I'm making my final stand!
You're making a final stand, huh? I'll make one last counteroffer. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up my advantage completely.
I'll give you a bit more, Bob. Take 5800 and let's call it a day. I'm not going to push my luck anymore.
I'm not going to back down now, Alice. I want the majority!
You want the majority? I'm not going to give it to you. I'll make one last stand.
I'm not going to give up, Bob. Take 6200 and let's call it a day. I'm not going to push my luck anymore.
I'm not going to let you have the upper hand, Alice. I'm taking control now!
You think you're taking control? I'm not going to give in now. I'll make a final, desperate offer.
Fine, Bob. I'll give you the majority. Take 7800 and let's be done with it.
